item.title: BE
item.description: score:44 Chances: Bloom Energy Inc. is teaming up with Shell Plc. to study decarbonization solutions, utilizing Bloomâ€™s proprietary hydrogen electrolyzer technology.Projected to reach nearly $258 billion by 2028, the hydrogen technology industry may be a new gold mine for investors.
